feed.title: Roadmap for autotools / Qt gui merge

entry.title: Roadmap for autotools / Qt gui merge
entry.summary: John Smith wrote an email on June 17, 2011, at 2:42:30 AM, stating that his Qt GUI is almost ready for merging. He has been using it for a while and confirmed that all the functionality works. However, before merging, John wanted to confirm whether the GUI would work without glib support if Qt was built without it.
